import_reason: added to workaround missing CPU temperature sensors in dom0
Required for clustering, a feature we don't support. Was also required to build lvm2's lvm2-cluster subpackage. lvm2 rebuilt without cvcluster support and corosync removed from dom0, along with dlm

Was a requirement of corosync, but we don't include corosync anymore in dom0. Was also a build dep for one of lvm2's subpackages, that we don't build anymore to remove the build dependency towards dlm. We also removed dlm from xs-opam-repo.

updated by us to rsyslog-8.24.0-52.el7_8.2 for memory leak fixes. Dependency libfastjson not updated but would need to be if we used the mm-normalize plugin (RHBZ #1591493)
